artical.privacyPolicyContent:
## Privacy Policy

### Introduction
This Privacy Policy describes how MDC ("we", "our", or "us") handles your information when you use our markdown conversion service.

### Data Collection
MDC is a static web application that runs entirely in your browser. We do not:

- Collect personal information
- Store your markdown content on any server
- Use cookies to track your behavior
- Share any data with third parties
- Have a backend server that processes your data

### How Your Data is Handled

### Local Processing
All conversion operations are performed locally in your web browser. Your markdown content never leaves your device.

#### Local Storage
Any saved preferences (such as theme selection or language choice) are stored only in your browser's local storage and remain on your device.

#### Clipboard Access
When you use clipboard features like "Paste" or "Copy", the app requests permission to access your clipboard. This data is only used for the immediate operation and is not stored or transmitted.

### Third-Party Libraries
This application uses open-source libraries for functionality. These libraries run locally in your browser and don't transmit your data.

### Changes to This Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

### Contact Us
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@qiqiyorozu.com.

*Last updated: May 8, 2025*
